sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO /* PublicAPI.insertApartDealingCost */ apart_dealcost ( mod_time, building_year, contract_year, dong, deposit, building_name, contract_month, rent, contract_date, private_area, bunji, region_code, floor) VALUES( NOW(), #building_year#, #contract_year#, #dong#, #deposit#, #building_name#, #contract_month#, #rent#, #contract_date#, #private_area#, #bunji#, #region_code#, #floor#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* PublicAPI.selectApartDealingCostList */ id, mod_time, building_year, contract_year, dong, deposit, building_name, contract_month, rent, contract_date, private_area, bunji, region_code, floor FROM apart_dealcost
region_code = #region_code#
deposit <= #deposit#
rent <= #rent#
